Functions
00600_mcCloseSession
Normal_Client_API

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100 ()
 
 TestCase_BC00101_SessionNullPointer ()
 
 TestCase_BC00102_SessionInvalidId ()
 
 TestCase_BC00103_SessionInvalidDevice ()
 
 TestCase_BC00104_CloseMultipleTimes ()
 

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in registry as 05010000000000000000000000000000.trst
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free Generic preconditions (setup)
      Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. They are executed always in front of every single test case.
  • open device using the default ID by calling mcOpenDevice()
  • allocate a WSM buffer (4k)
  • open a session to the Trusted Application

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • close session to the Trusted Application
  • free allocated memory of WSM buffer
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100 ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Focus:
mcCloseSession closes a session with default ID parameter.
Test Steps:
TLC closes a default device (MC_DEVICE_ID_DEFAULT) after successfully opening the device returns MC_DRV_OK.
Test output is OK
Manual Execution:
No

Yes

TestCase_BC00102_SessionInvalidId ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Focus:
mcCloseSession handles a bad session id.
Test Steps:
TLC calls function with a malformed session id.
Ensures the unknown session ids are handled. returns MC_DRV_ERR_UNKNOWN_SESSION.
Test output is OK

TestCase_BC00104_CloseMultipleTimes ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Focus:
mcCloseSession handles an already closed session's close request.
Test Steps:
TLC tries to close a device multiple times. Ensures there is no remained of previously closed session. returns MC_DRV_ERR_UNKNOWN_SESSION.
Test output is OK
Manual Execution:
No
